column4: I am trying to follow this how-to but I cannot find the packages in the repository they tell you to add (http://www.ubuntugeek.com/howto-install-sofa-media-center-in-ubuntu.html)
you can add repos to the file but if you dont apt-get update you have no idea what is on the repo
until you modprobed the module i again
yes,but you can remove it from the automatically inserted modules and it wouldnt
why do you want to remove it
then leave it and you'll be fine
so its a usb hard drive?
plug it in and run sudo fdisk -l
you need to work out whats what
you can make any directory you want and mount it there
